title: Necrolord
description: How does one come to understand evil?The Necrolord has made her move. Countless dead. Now even the Council wants to stop her. And they’ve hired me to do it.But I don’t play well with authority figures, and as this city-wide manhunt escalates, I’m sure to offend more than a few politicians and cops.But none of that matters.Because the Necrolord has killed too many people already. And I need to make her pay.My name is Kat Drummond, and I’m a part-time monster hunter.
author: Nicholas Woode-Smith
